description: The Google Web Fonts Developer API lets you retrieve information about web fonts served by Google.
name: webfonts

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

list.description: Retrieves the list of fonts currently served by the Google Fonts Developer API.

capability.description: Controls the font urls in `Webfont.files`, by default, static ttf fonts are sent.
enumDescriptions: Prefer variable font files instead of static fonts instantiated at standard weights.

category.description: Filters by Webfont.category, if category is found in Webfont.categories. If not set, returns all families.

family.description: Filters by Webfont.family, using literal match. If not set, returns all families

enumDescriptions: No sorting specified, use the default sorting method.

subset.description: Filters by Webfont.subset, if subset is found in Webfont.subsets. If not set, returns all families.

Axis.description: Metadata for a variable font axis.

Webfont.description: Metadata describing a family of fonts.

colorCapabilities.description: The color format(s) available for this family.

files.description: The font files (with all supported scripts) for each one of the available variants, as a key : value map.

kind.description: This kind represents a webfont object in the webfonts service.

lastModified.description: The date (format "yyyy-MM-dd") the font was modified for the last time.

menu.description: Font URL for menu subset, a subset of the font that is enough to display the font name

subsets.description: The scripts supported by the font.

variants.description: The available variants for the font.

WebfontList.description: Response containing the list of fonts currently served by the Google Fonts API.

items.description: The list of fonts currently served by the Google Fonts API.

kind.description: This kind represents a list of webfont objects in the webfonts service.

title: Web Fonts Developer API
